description: felted silk base with grey lining; large multi-colored flat stitch embroidery; back and sleeves have large snake, circular pattern; fronts have large dragon-like panel on each side; 12 long bands with pictorial embroidery and on bottom of each panel are two pink fan feather tassels connected with seeds; all boarders have stiff brown fabric (pounded indigo) in cut diamond pattern
dimension: 52 x 66 in. (132.08 x 167.64 cm) (including feather tassels)
title: Jacket (Hundred Bird Coat)
